languages.text: {n}Качество изображения оставляет желать лучшего, но вы можете различить множество аугментов и богатые одежды преступника. Есть что-то горделивое, почти маниакальное в его позе — как у тиранов, которые рано или поздно провозглашают себя богами.{/n}

{n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Качество изображения оставляет желать лучшего, но вы можете различить множество аугментов и богатые одежды преступника. Есть что-то горделивое, почти маниакальное в его позе — как у тиранов, которые рано или поздно провозглашают себя богами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

{n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

{n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

{n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

{n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La calidad de imagen no es la mejor, pero puedes identificar el exceso de auméticos del criminal y sus ropajes lujosos. Hay algo altanero y casi maníaco en su porte que recuerda a los tiranos que, tarde o temprano, se acaban proclamando dioses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La calidad de imagen no es la mejor, pero puedes identificar el exceso de auméticos del criminal y sus ropajes lujosos. Hay algo altanero y casi maníaco en su porte que recuerda a los tiranos que, tarde o temprano, se acaban proclamando dioses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}全息照片的图像质量不怎么令人满意，但你依然看得出来，这个罪犯全身嵌满了浮夸的植入物，身上穿着花里胡哨的衣服。他的表情看起来相当傲慢，甚至有些癫狂，就像那些往往会自诩为神明的暴君一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}全息照片的图像质量不怎么令人满意，但你依然看得出来，这个罪犯全身嵌满了浮夸的植入物，身上穿着花里胡哨的衣服。他的表情看起来相当傲慢，甚至有些癫狂，就像那些往往会自诩为神明的暴君一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Si la qualité de l'image laisse à désirer, vous distinguez néanmoins la surenchère d'implants et de vêtements luxueux dont le criminel est bardé. Il se dégage de sa personne une aura altière qui confine au dogmatisme, à l'instar de ces tyrans qui finissent invariablement par se prendre pour des dieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Si la qualité de l'image laisse à désirer, vous distinguez néanmoins la surenchère d'implants et de vêtements luxueux dont le criminel est bardé. Il se dégage de sa personne une aura altière qui confine au dogmatisme, à l'instar de ces tyrans qui finissent invariablement par se prendre pour des dieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イメージの質はいまひとつ物足りないが、あなたは犯罪者の数多くのオーグメントと豪華な服装を理解することができる。横柄な、ほとんど狂ったような何かが彼の身のこなし中にある―遅かれ早かれ彼ら自身を神と称する暴君のような何かが。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イメージの質はいまひとつ物足りないが、あなたは犯罪者の数多くのオーグメントと豪華な服装を理解することができる。横柄な、ほとんど狂ったような何かが彼の身のこなし中にある―遅かれ早かれ彼ら自身を神と称する暴君のような何かが。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Görüntü kalitesi pek de beklenildik seviyede değil ancak suçlunun çok sayıdaki ogmetiği ve görkemli kıyafetlerini seçebiliyorsun. Duruşunda mağrur, neredeyse delice bir şey var. Er ya da geç kendisini tanrı ilan eden tiranlara benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Görüntü kalitesi pek de beklenildik seviyede değil ancak suçlunun çok sayıdaki ogmetiği ve görkemli kıyafetlerini seçebiliyorsun. Duruşunda mağrur, neredeyse delice bir şey var. Er ya da geç kendisini tanrı ilan eden tiranlara benziyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Bildqualität ist schlecht, aber du kannst die Augmentierungen und prächtigen Gewänder des Verbrechers erkennen. Der Mann hat etwas Manisches an sich ... wie ein Tyrann, der sich früher oder später für einen Gott hält.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The image quality leaves something to be desired, but you can make out the criminal's surfeit of augments and sumptuous clothing. There is something haughty, almost maniacal in his bearing — like the tyrants who sooner or later proclaim themselves gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Bildqualität ist schlecht, aber du kannst die Augmentierungen und prächtigen Gewänder des Verbrechers erkennen. Der Mann hat etwas Manisches an sich ... wie ein Tyrann, der sich früher oder später für einen Gott hält.{/n}
